hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo apt-get update #Set the below parameters manually package_name="ruby" published_version="2.5.0"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then sudo apt-get update available_version=$(sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
# Install dependencies sudo apt-get update -y sudo apt-get install -y gcc make wget tar bzip2 subversion bison flex openssl
# Set environment variables export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH
# Download Ruby 2.5.0 source code wget http://cache.ruby-lang.org/pub/ruby/2.5/ruby-2.5.0.tar.gz tar zxf ruby-2.5.0.tar.gz cd ruby-2.5.0
# Configure and build Ruby ./configure make
# Install Ruby sudo -E make install
# Test the results make test
# Verify Ruby
ruby -v ruby -v | grep 2.5.0 gem env
